features: 【All in 1 Phone Holder】The phone holder is a perfect combination of a selfie stick and a tripod. It has a fully telescopic handle and built-in foldable legs. When press the button at the bottom of the phone tripod, the three legs will open and can be used as a stand tripod. After adjusting the height of the telescopic pole, it can double as a desktop tripod. The multi-function tripod for phone is very suitable for taking pictures,Face time etc.

【60'' Telescopic Pole】The telescopic Pole is made of aluminum alloy,so the phone tripod stand is not only lightweight but also corrosion-resistant, sturdy and durable. The adjustable height of the cell phone tripod is 11.4~60 inches (completely folded 11.4inches, adjusted in 9 stections), allowing you to shoot various heights that other phone tripod mount cannot shoot, capturing a wider field of view, and satisfying your needs in different occasions.

【Reinforced Tripod Base】Very easy to use, just press the button on the bottom to unlock three legs of the tripod for iphone. The base of the newly upgraded cellphone tripod adopts a reinforced design with a silicone non-slip foot pad, which is more stable after unfolding and is not easy to shake. Note: In the tripod mode, the phone must be placed in the center of the sliding track, which is consistent with the center of gravity of the tripod to avoid tipping.

【Chargeable Remote Shutter】The tripod for phone has a built-in rechargeable wireless remote control,supports shooting within 10m,is compatible with IOS/Android,quickly realizes pairing, and the operation is very simple.When the remote control is not in use,it can be put into the special remote control slot on the handle of the selfie stick for iphone to prevent it from being lost.The mount range of the tripod phone holder is about 2.28-3.46inch in size, which is suitable for 4-7'' phones.

【Portable & Rotation】Having a compact design and can be carried around without taking up space. The phone tripod with remote can rotate the phone screen horizontally and vertically , and the angle can be easily adjusted. You can quickly choose the camera mode at any angle to get the best photoes. In the selfie stick with remote mode, you can also slide the phone mount left and right, which is very flexible and convenient.
body.description: Specification: Name: Phone selfie stick tripodProduct wight:338g/0.74lbProduct size:1.43*1.43*11.41''Product material:aluminum alloy,ABS,PCMaximum length:152cm/60'' Supports fast rotating screens horizontally and vertically , multi-angle rotation and flexible adjustment. Small and portable, the folded size is 11.4‘', and the weight is 338g, making it easy to carry around. The tripod and selfie stick can be quickly switched, suitable for family gatherings and recording wonderful moments when traveling.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional Phone Selfie Stick Tripod This stand is not only a portable mobile phone tripod, but also a fully retractable handheld selfie stick. Selfie stick tripod with remote has a small volume design that can be easily put into a backpack, allowing you to carry it with you when you travel, and always record your best self.

Note： If you want to use it as a selfie stick, please ignore step 1, no need to press the button to turn on the tripod, just refer to step 2 to step 4.You must release your hand after pulling the top cover about 3cm, otherwise you will pinch your hands if you continue to pull the top cover. Place the phone horizontally: Place the side of the phone on the inner wall of the phone holder, and on the other side pull out the arm of the clip to the length of the phone to fix the phone, and then rotate the phone to place it horizontally. Place the phone vertically: First make sure that the height of the phone is placed above the bottom bracket, then place the side of the phone on the inner wall of the phone holder, and on the other side pull out the arm of the clip to the length of the phone to fix the phone. Then Slide the slide rails left and right to adjust the field of view. (Note: In the tripod mode, the mobile phone must be placed in the center of the slide rail, consistent with the center of gravity of the tripod to avoid tipping.) Note:Please pay attention to the protection of the handle when using, if the tripod touches hard objects may damage the surface of the handle. When closing the tripod, please note that you need to retract each section of the telescopic pole completely, otherwise the top cover will not close completely when you finally close the tripod.

Flexible Adjustment of Various Angles The unique sliding rail design makes the clip of the phone tripod mount more flexible and can quickly rotate the phone screens horizontally and vertically. So it can meet your needs for different angles and fields of view. PLEASE NOTE: The phone clip supports 4-7 in phone with a case. Not suitable for phones with thicker cases such as wallet cases.Please pay attention to the location of the charging cable when opening the box to avoid losing it. After using the product, please keep the charging cable properly.

More details Folded length:28.3cm/11.41'' Clip size:2.28''-3.46''(suitable for 4''-7'' phones) Phone type:compatible with IOS 7.0+&Andriod 5.0+ Remote control range :about 10m（without obstacles） Packing list：A tripod stand,A remote,An instruction sheet Specification: Name: Phone selfie stick tripodProduct wight:338g/0.74lbProduct size:1.43*1.43*11.41''Product material:aluminum alloy,ABS,PCMaximum length:152cm/60'' Supports fast rotating screens horizontally and vertically , multi-angle rotation and flexible adjustment. Small and portable, the folded size is 11.4‘', and the weight is 338g, making it easy to carry around. The tripod and selfie stick can be quickly switched, suitable for family gatherings and recording wonderful moments when traveling.

Telescopic Pole The tripod for iphone can adjustable length, which provides more possibilities for taking pictures. The telescopic pole can be adjusted in 9 sections, up to 60 inches long, to capture a wider field of view.Aluminum alloy material makes it more durable against rust. Stable Tripod Base The enlarged range of the base can strengthen the load-bearing capacity of the tripod, making it more stable and not easy to shake. The silicone foot pad at the bottom can increase friction and play a non-slip effect, allowing you to use it with confidence. Extend Phone Size The size of the phone holder can be adjusted in the range of 2.28-3.46in. Suitable for 4-7" mobile phones. The inner side of the arm is equipped with a silicone pad to protect the mobile phone from scratches during installation.

Separate Charging Remote The chargeable shutter has a built-in 50mA lithium battery and supports USB charging, which is very convenient to use. When not in use, you can put it back into the wireless remote control card slot to avoid losing it. Compatible with IOS & Android The remote control of cell phone tripod is compatible with IOS 7.0+ and Android 5.0 +systems, and quickly realizes pairing without any complicated operations. You can shoot at will within 10m, and easily take photos with friends or family in the distance. Easy to Carry The folded size of the phone tripod stand is only 11.4 inches, which is compact and portable and does not take up space. It is very suitable for traveling and taking it with you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for travel
reviews.reviewText: Wasn't expecting much of this but this works SO well!! Took it on a trip to Japan and cannot believe we didn't get this sooner. It seems very sturdy and folds so compactly-was easy to carry and just as easy to use. The remote worked well and helped us get much better "selfies"!If you get any kind of stand/selfie stick this is the one to get. It's all there... Price point + Quality + Function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my favorite compact Tripod I've used
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This tripod is very compact, and sturdy. The remote makes it easy to take photos without having to set a timer, it connects to your phone via bluetooth. I have owned three of these tripods for various reasons and continue to cheer this tripod on for it compact size, weight, and functionality. It gets great height but does get a little flimsy the taller it gets, but still sturdy, just don't have in a very windy area. Other than that I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought this to take scenic selfies while hiking. The slim and lightweight design makes it convenient to tuck into a backpack and hike up mountains with. It’s easy to connect your phone to and the button is sleek so you can easily hide it in your hand so it is not noticeable in pictures. It’s pretty sturdy at all heights and quick and easy to set up. The battery life lasts pretty long and it’s quick to charge. Good bang for buck! I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Portable Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I needed a tripod for a filmmaker interview, and this did the trick! Easy to open and set up, it supported my iPhone 13 in an Otterbox case without tipping over. The remote connects quickly and easily to my phone and starts/stops video/image recording just as advertised. It's lightweight but not flimsy, and slipped right into my laptop case. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Designed to withstand regular use and the rigors of outdoor shooting.
reviews.reviewText: The TONEOF 60" Cell Phone Selfie Stick Tripod is a versatile and handy accessory designed for smartphone users who want to capture high-quality photos and videos, whether for selfies, group shots, or vlogs. Here are the key features and benefits of this smartphone tripod:3-in-1 Design: This product combines three essential functions into one: a selfie stick, a tripod, and a phone holder. This versatile design provides flexibility for capturing a wide range of shots and angles.Adjustable Height: The selfie stick tripod can extend up to 60 inches (150 cm) in height, allowing you to capture shots from various perspectives, including overhead and full-body shots.Phone Holder: The adjustable phone holder accommodates a wide range of smartphone sizes. It securely holds your phone in place, ensuring that it doesn't slip or fall during use.Bluetooth Remote Control: Many models of this tripod come with a Bluetooth remote control that allows you to remotely trigger your phone's camera. This feature is convenient for taking photos or starting video recordings without needing assistance.360-Degree Rotation: The phone holder often offers 360-degree rotation, enabling you to switch between portrait and landscape modes and find the perfect angle for your shots.Sturdy and Stable: The tripod's legs are designed to provide stability and support for your smartphone, ensuring that it remains steady during use. This is particularly valuable for capturing clear and sharp images and videos.Lightweight and Portable: Despite its extended height, the tripod is lightweight and portable, making it easy to carry with you for on-the-go photography and videography.Wide Range of Uses: This selfie stick tripod is suitable for various applications, including selfies, group photos, video calls, vlogging, live streaming, and time-lapse videos.Durable Construction: The materials used in the construction of this tripod are often durable and designed to withstand regular use and the rigors of outdoor shooting.Affordable: These tripods are typically affordable, providing a cost-effective solution for smartphone users who want to enhance their photography and videography capabilities.In summary, the TONEOF 60" Cell Phone Selfie Stick Tripod is a practical accessory for smartphone users looking to improve their photography and videography. With its 3-in-1 design, adjustable height, Bluetooth remote control, and stability, it offers a range of features that make it a valuable addition to your smartphone accessories. Whether you're a content creator, a traveler, or simply someone who loves taking photos, this tripod provides the convenience and versatility you need for capturing the perfect shots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite tripod!
reviews.reviewText: I love this tripod! It’s sturdy but is compact and doesn’t take up a lot of space. I really like that the Bluetooth shutter can be on the handle as a button or it can be removed and held. It’s really helpful as a content creator!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and small, for how tell it gets!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I had a hard time finding other selfie sticks/tripods that were as small as this one and still got as tall. I wanted one that would hold my phone right in front of my face (I'm 5'3"). I've traveled a bunch with this tripod and it's never been an issue (I was worried about the shape of it at first). It's really easy to setup and move, and versatile for many different locations. The part that holds the phone can move around into a many different positions. Overall, it's perfect for my needs :)The remote is a nice addition, but I don't personally use it. The only thing I don't love is that it's not always stable when it's open most of the way, and can sometimes wobble. This hasn't been a big enough issue for me to seek out other tripods though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for UGC Creators
reviews.reviewText: Ive owned many tripods over the years, but this one is by far the best AND a great price point too. I love how compact it is and how easy it is to carry and transport to multiple locations. The design is sleek and its really just a perfect tripod for content creators.

Al principio creía que tenía muy mala calidad, pero la verdad es que sus materiales metales y plásticos son resistentes, además de que es pesado por lo que puede soportar bien el peso de cualquier celular de gama media, aún no he probado el control remoto pero se ve que su uso es sencillo.
Not for heavy phone but does the job pretty well

reviews.reviewTitle: A versatile and essential tool for mobile photography enthusiasts!
reviews.reviewText: The TONEOF 60" Cell Phone Selfie Stick Tripod is a revelation for anyone passionate about photography, vlogging, or just capturing life's moments. This all-in-one gadget has redefined my experience with mobile photography, combining the convenience of a selfie stick with the stability of a tripod. I personally love the light weight and I have sold all my camera gear and now only travel with an iPhone as my main camera. So a lightweight tripod is the perfect companion.Its 60-inch extension is a standout feature, offering a range of heights and angles that traditional selfie sticks can't match. Whether I'm taking group photos, or framing the perfect video frame, the versatility is unmatched. It's like having a personal photographer on hand, ready to adapt to any scenario.The build quality of the TONEOF tripod is another plus. It feels sturdy and well-constructed, capable of holding the phone securely in place, which is essential for peace of mind when using it in various environments.Additionally, the portability of this gadget is a huge advantage. It folds down to a manageable size, making it easy to carry on travels, hikes, or city adventures. It's not just a tool; it's a travel companion that enhances the photographic experience.In conclusion, the TONEOF 60" Cell Phone Selfie Stick Tripod is an excellent investment for anyone looking to elevate their mobile photography game. It's versatile, user-friendly, and reliable – a trifecta that makes it a must-have for photographers and enthusiasts alike.

The media could not be loaded. Este tripé é simplesmente maravilhoso! Impressionada com a qualidade do material, resistente, cabe na mochila, tenho 1.70 de altura e quando abro o tripé totalmente fica quase da minha altura. Um ponto que vale destacar também, é que a previsão de chegada era "a partir do dia 3 de julho" e chegou exatamente no dia 27 de junho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great Tripod for my phone it have a sturdy design and adjustable legs, this tripod can be set up on any surface and in any position, making it versatile for a variety of shooting scenarios.It's also compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around in a bag or backpack. Overall, this tripod is a great, affordable option for those looking to improve their phone photography or videography.
